title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Exploring the Identity of Educational Technology (EdTech) and Setting Future Directions

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: The core concepts of EdTech can be categorized and explained under four themes: redefinition of technology, expansion of research scope, re-establishment of interdisciplinary relationships, and improvement of research methodologies.
A VR simulation-based EdTech research framework applicable to science education can be designed and presented.
A report analyzing the limitations of existing EdTech research and proposing alternative approaches can be written.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
